text: Table 5. Actions to Initiate When Subcutaneous Emphysema Is Suspected or Noticed Evaluate for a pneumothorax Check end-tidal CO, and arterial CO, Increase ventilation rate and tidal volume Increase oxygen to 100% CO,, absorber in the circuit Decreased IAP Discontinue NO because it rapidly enters the area of tissue emphysema Assess airway to ensure there is no compression before extubation
